title.narrative: Urgent intervention to eliminate cholera epidemic in seven Yemeni governorates with priority in the water and environmental sanitation sector.

description.narrative: Providing all services in the water and environmental sanitation sector to contribute to preventing cholera outbreaks in the following regions and governorates (Sana'a, Ibb, Omran, Hodeidah, Mahwat, Dhamar and Marib) in Yemen and providing comprehensive water and sanitation care.

The emergency humanitarian response in Yemen has entered the water and environmental sanitation sector by providing drinking water, daily personal use and environmental services that contribute to and help reduce and eliminate the cholera epidemic in priority areas.
